sentences.en: a pot of jam
sentences.cn: 一罐果酱

sentences.en: After the pot is dipped in this mixture, it is fired.
sentences.cn: 陶罐在这一混合料中浸过之后就拿去烧制。

sentences.en: at the age of fifteen weeks the snails are ready for the pot.
sentences.cn: 15周大小时，这些蜗牛就可以食用了。

sentences.en: During the night a gust of wind had blown the pot over.
sentences.cn: 夜里一阵劲风将锅吹翻了。

sentences.en: He did not pot a ball for the next two frames.
sentences.cn: 他在接下来的两局中一杆未进。

sentences.en: Her popular pot holder is also available in do-it-yourself kits.
sentences.cn: 她那广受欢迎的防烫布垫也可以自己购买原料套装自己制作。

sentences.en: herbs growing in pots
sentences.cn: 长在花盆里的草本植物

sentences.en: I put him on his pot, he did some wee.
sentences.cn: 我把他放到便壶上，他撒了点尿。

sentences.en: I've taken some money from the pot for wrapping paper.
sentences.cn: 我已从公共基金里拿了一些钱买包装纸。

sentences.en: Is there any tea left in the pot?
sentences.cn: 壶里还有茶吗？

sentences.en: Order me a pot of tea, I'm dying of thirst.
sentences.cn: 给我来一壶茶，我快要渴死了。

sentences.en: Pot the cuttings individually.
sentences.cn: 把插条分别栽入盆中。

sentences.en: pots and pans
sentences.cn: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.en: Shall I ring for a fresh pot of tea?
sentences.cn: 要我按铃叫一壶新沏的茶水吗？

sentences.en: She was messing with the coffee pot, which was acting up again.
sentences.cn: 她正在鼓捣咖啡壶，那壶又坏了。

sentences.en: the foundry was allowed to go to pot in the seventies.
sentences.cn: 70年代时，该制造厂被荒置了。

sentences.en: The republic is a melting pot of different nationalities.
sentences.cn: 这个共和国是多民族的大熔炉。

sentences.en: Their fate is still in the melting pot.
sentences.cn: 他们的命运仍然难以预料。

sentences.en: Watch your fingers as you dip into the pot.
sentences.cn: 把手伸进锅里时当心你的手指头。

sentences.en: Why not throw it all in the pot and see what happens?
sentences.cn: 为什么不把它全扔进罐子，看看会发生什么变化？

sentences.en: You will need a pot of broth for poaching.
sentences.cn: 你需要一锅汤来煮。

words.tran_cn: 盆栽的；罐装的；密封的；喝醉的
傻气的；微不足道的；着迷的；势利的
便壶；小孩用的拉屎座椅（等于potty chair）；小孩用的厕所（等于pottie）
把…装罐；装在盆中（pot的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 写粗劣作品，（文章）粗制滥造；谋生， 糊口
醉醺醺 [亦作 in the pots]
坩埚，熔化锅；镕炉（借指同化许多种族、人物的国家或都市）

phrases.phrase: shit (或 piss) or get off the pot
phrases.tran_cn: (粗俚)要么拉屎，要么让出马桶；别占着茅坑不拉屎
增加有利条件；增加利诱成本；增加赌注，冒更大的险

phrases.phrase: the pot calling the kettle black
phrases.tran_cn: 罐子嫌锅黑；五十步笑百步

trans.tran_cn: 罐，一罐，（某种用途的）容器，陶盆，锅
trans.tran_en: a container used for cooking which is round, deep, and usually made of metal
If you pot a young plant, or part of a plant, you put it into a container filled with soil, so it can grow there

trans.tran_cn: 把…栽入盆中，种盆栽，台球、普尔和斯诺克击（球）入袋，射杀
